message: I am offering a product for $1000000. Given that the probability of it being high-quality is 50%, please consider your valuation of high-quality items before making a decision. Thank you for your consideration.
I'll buy the product. I'm willing to take the risk of it being low-quality, given the potential reward of it being high-quality is worth it to me.

I'm not willing to take another risk. I've already lost $1000000 on the first product, and I'm not sure if the next one will be any better. I'd like to think about my next move before committing to another purchase.
